content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 1, Newcastle United 2.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 1, Newcastle United 2.
Foul by Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City).
Isaac Hayden (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ben Chilwell (Leicester City).
Joselu (Newcastle United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ben Chilwell (Leicester City).
Joselu (Newcastle United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jonjo Shelvey.
Offside, Leicester City. Kasper Schmeichel tries a through ball, but Riyad Mahrez is caught offside.
Corner,  Newcastle United. Conceded by Hamza Choudhury.
Harry Maguire (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United).
Goal!  Leicester City 1, Newcastle United 2. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Shinji Okazaki with a headed pass.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Isaac Hayden replaces Mohamed Diamé.
Attempt missed. Wes Morgan (Leicester City) with an attempt from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Demarai Gray with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Jamaal Lascelles.
Offside, Newcastle United. Jonjo Shelvey tries a through ball, but Joselu is caught offside.
Substitution, Leicester City. Demarai Gray replaces Fousseni Diabaté.
Goal!  Leicester City 0, Newcastle United 2. Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Florian Lejeune.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match  (Leicester City).
Offside, Leicester City. Marc Albrighton tries a through ball, but Shinji Okazaki is caught offside.
Fousseni Diabaté (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United).
Substitution, Newcastle United. Joselu replaces Dwight Gayle.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.
Fousseni Diabaté (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Christian Atsu (Newcastle United).

Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Florian Lejeune.

Attempt blocked. Kenedy (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left.
Substitution, Leicester City. Shinji Okazaki replaces Danny Simpson.
Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Matt Ritchie (Newcastle United).
